info.name: TypeRacer - Modern
info.description:
Version: 1.0.4

Changed the colors to something more Modern and Dark. Most colors are based off of Bootstrap's default color scheme #292b2c and #EEE.

Also centered the content pages for example on Userpage, it is now centered instead of all the way to the left. This works for every page I've tested thus far.

Applied the Viewport extension to this theme as well, the Viewport is 900px wide. Easily adjustable in the CSS file if needed.
info.additionalInfo:
[CHANGELOG 1.0.4]
- Changed highlighting colors to Blue, because.... Green sucks. 
- Removed underlining, because it also looks bad. Kinda taken from Kathy (florentine) 

[CHANGELOG 1.0.3]
Most of these changes were done by Kathy (florentine), so much thanks to her. I don't really know what changes she has done, I just noticed these.
- Changed Background Color on the Race Timer
- Changed Highlighted words to Blue
- Slightly narrowed viewport
- Changed background color for Navigation items to a specific shade of White.
- Made Font bigger in Racetrack.

[CHANGELOG 1.0.2]
- Changed font color to #FFF for Countdown timer (thanks Kathy!)
- Removed blue border on some dialogs (thanks Kathy!)
- Changed colors from Blue to #292 (thanks Kathy!!!!!!!! she did most of this)

[CHANGELOG 1.0.1]
- Modified countdown box background
- Removed side borders on several things.
